Post.title: GitHub Pages + HexoNexT
Post._content:
github html
<!-- more -->

## 
### 
www.missfli.com 
[godaddy](https://sg.godaddy.com/zh/)[](https://www.jianshu.com/p/05289a4bc8b2) **** 
### 
[GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) githubgithub 
[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/)  Node.js  Git 
gitgithubgitgithubgit

* Node https://nodejs.org/en/
* Git https://git-scm.com/download/win
* Githubhttps://desktop.github.com/
### Git 
GitGit
```swift
$ git config --global user.name "username"
$ git config --global user.email "username@example.com"
```
user.emailGitHubcommitsemailKeeping your email address private:
1. GitHubSettings
1. Personal settingsEmails
1. Keep my email address private

email
`$ git config --global user.email "username@users.noreply.github.com"`

## Github 
###  new repository
GitHubusername.github.iousername )

GitHub PagesUser/Organization Pages  Project PagesUser Pages

User Pages  Project Pages

1. User Pages  Project Pages 
1.  User Pages username.github.io Project Pages 
1. User Pages  master  Project Pages  gh-pages 
1. User Pages  http(s)://username.github.io  Projects Pages http(s)://username.github.io/projectname 


*  
* username.github.iousername
* 10-30

**** 
![new-repository.png](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1464420-ec89ff7605fb8739.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

### 
github xxx.github.io 
[Github ](https://www.jianshu.com/p/be3ca7841484)


## SSH key
githubssh key
1. SSH KEYS
`$ ls -al ~/.ssh`
public keysid_dsa.pubid_ecdsa.pubid_ed25519.pubid_rsa.pubpublicprivateid_ras.pubid_rsaSSH keysNo such file or directory git

2. SSH KEYSSH KEY
`ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@example.com"`
3`.ssh\id_rsa.pub`github -> SSH and GPG keys -> New SSH key

![image](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1464420-c0db2cf48e955749.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

keytitle

3. 
`$ ssh -T git@github.com`

`Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)?`yes

> Hi liuxianan! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.

SSH


```
$ git config --global user.name "liuxianan"// github
$ git config --global user.email  "xxx@qq.com"// github
```



![ssh-key.png](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1464420-f9ad654379dc006f.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

## Hexo

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/) 


1. Windowscmdgit bashgit bash
1. hexo2.x
1. hexo2_config.yml_config.ymltheme

### Hexo 
 Git Bash 
```swift
#Hexo 
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
#
$ hexo -version 
#
$ hexo init <project-name>
$ cd <project-name>
$ npm install
#markdownhtml
$ hexo generate
#landscape
$ hexo server
```

## NexT 
 langscape 
[NexT ](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) 
http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html

####  NexT
* 
 Hexo  Git checkout 
```swift
$ cd your-hexo-site
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```
* 
_config.yml
`theme: next`
* 

`hexo s --debug`

INFO  Hexo is running at http://0.0.0.0:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop.
 http://localhost:4000

#### NexT 
*  Scheme
*  
*  
*  
*  
*  
*  

### NexT 
* 
* LeanCloud
* Algolia 

### 


## hexo

```swift
hexo new "postName" #
hexo new page "pageName" #
hexo generate #public
hexo server #4000'ctrl + c'server
hexo deploy #GitHub
hexo help  # 
hexo version  #Hexo
```

```swift
hexo n == hexo new
hexo g == hexo generate
hexo s == hexo server
hexo d == hexo deploy
```

```swift
hexo s -g #
hexo d -g #
```

##  github

ssh key
_config.ymldeploy
_config.yml
```swift
# Deployment
## Docs: http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type:
```
_config.yml
```swift
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: SSHGitHub
  branch: User PagesmasterProject Pagesgh-pages
```
HexoGitHub
`$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save`

```swift
$ hexo generate
$ hexo deploy
```
username.github.io~

## 
 html  github  htmlgithub

## CNAMEREADME.md??
CNAMEREADME.mdsource

## 404??
GitHub Pages404[Custom 404 Pages](https://help.GitHub.com/articles/custom-404-Pages)
 404.html  404.md 404
[404](http://www.qq.com/404)

## ??
10G

#### 
* [GitHub Pages + Hexo](http://crazymilk.github.io/2015/12/28/GitHub-Pages-Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/#more)
* [Github PagesHexo](https://www.jianshu.com/p/05289a4bc8b2)
* [hexo+github](http://www.cnblogs.com/liuxianan/p/build-blog-website-by-hexo-github.html)
* [-hexo+github](https://www.jianshu.com/p/189fd945f38f)

Post.title: markdown Hexo
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!-- more -->

## Quick Start 

###  markdown 



``` bash
# 
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

* 1
* 2
* 3
  * 31
  * 3

1. 1
1. 1
1. 1
1. 1



![new-repository.png](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1464420-ec89ff7605fb8739.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)


### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```


#### 
* [1](http://www.missfli.com)
* [2](http://www.missfli.com)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

``` bash
# 
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```
